name: mern
description: Don't forget to star the repo. Demo website : https://mern-social-media-sdp.herokuapp.com/ # mern-social-media-complete-project A MERN stack based project on social media application. It is completely working project. Its' completely responsive application. MongoDB Express React Redux NodeJs are user in this project.

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
